timeline.bodyText: this should not be necessary, this indicates the tests are changing source directories, which is bad.
timeline.author: fbricon
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,3 @@
+# temp files generated when running test projects

replies.bodyText: so we want to keep the .gitignore unchanged, as this is our canary telling us the tests are bad
replies.author: fbricon

replies.bodyText: OK. I just let the canary go this time 😄
replies.author: Eskibear
